alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 11:01AM MDT until May 23 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Idaho... Warm Springs Creek near Ketchum affecting Blaine County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Warm Springs Creek near Ketchum. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.2 feet, Lowland flooding from near Barr Gulch Road to the confluence of the Big Wood river. Flooding possible in residential areas Whipsaw Lane to Sawdust Lane. Some bank erosion possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM MDT Saturday was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.8 feet on 04/27/2012. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Warm Springs Creek Ketchum 12.2 12.3 Sat 10 am MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
